metadata.title: CVE-2024-9367 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions startingfrom 13.9 before 17.4.6, 17.5 before 17.5.4, and 17.6 before 17.6.2, thatallows an attacker to cause uncontrolled CPU consumption, potentiallyleading to a Denial of Service (DoS) condition while parsing templates togenerate changelogs.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
